com.aeonium.javafx.validation.annotations

Annotation Type FXRequired


  • @Documented
 @Target(value=FIELD)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface FXRequired
    Mark a text-input field as required, i.e., it must have a non-empty input string.
    Author:
    Robert Rohm <r.rohm@aeonium-systems.de>

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String message 
      boolean required 
      java.lang.Class<? extends FXAbstractValidator> validation 

    • Element Detail

      • validation

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends FXAbstractValidator> validation
        Default:
        com.aeonium.javafx.validation.RequiredValidator.class

      • required

        public abstract boolean required
        Default:
        false

      • message

        public abstract java.lang.String message
        Default:
        "This field must not be empty!"
